Name: IAM
Description: Identity Access Management component. Central piece to store the identity information of users, admins and also maintains association with access to resources

Name: File Backup
Description: Agent component that provides agent machine data in streamed manner.
Dependency:
* IAM
* Storage Service
* RabbitMQ
* File Service

Name: Storage Service
Description: Manages underlying storage and supports various file transfer protocols.

Name: File Service
Description: Agent component that provides agent machine data in streamed manner.
Dependency:
* IAM
* Storage Service
* RabbitMQ
* File Service

Name: Email Archive
Description: It has agent + server part implemented together and sits in Cloud infrastructure. It can be deployed in AWS, MS Azure, private cloud, onpremise

Name: HashiCorp Vault
Description:
Vault is a tool for securely accessing secrets. A secret is anything that you want to tightly control access to, such as API keys, passwords, certificates, and more. Vault provides a unified interface to any secret, while providing tight access control and recording a detailed audit log.

Excellent documentation - https://git.company.com/projects/ABC/repos/msp-scm/browse/roles/msp.k8s.vault/readme.md

Name: ELK Exporter
Description: Used to search across all the data stored in product
Dependency:
* Endpoint Protection Manager
* HashiCorp Consul
* Prometheus
* PostgreSQL

Name: HashiCorp Consul
Description: Consul is used for registration and discovery of components in environment

Name: RabbitMQ
Description: RabbitMQ is an open-source message-broker software that originally implemented the Advanced Message Queuing Protocol and has since been extended with a plug-in architecture to support Streaming Text Oriented Messaging Protocol, Message Queuing Telemetry Transport, and other protocols

Name: Prometheus
Description: Prometheus is an open-source systems monitoring and alerting toolkit.

Name: Ookla Speedtest.net
Description: Periodically check on network speed in our own data center

Name: Percona Monitoring and Management
Description: Percona Monitoring and Management (PMM) is an open source platform for managing and monitoring MySQL and MongoDB performance. It is developed by percona in collaboration with experts in the field of managed database services, support and consulting. PMM is a free and open-source solution that you can run in your own environment for maximum security and reliability. It provides thorough time-based analysis for MySQL and MongoDB servers to ensure that your data works as efficiently as possible.

Name: Percona
Description: Percona is a leading provider of unbiased open source database solutions that allow organizations to easily, securely and affordably maintain business agility, minimize risks, and stay competitive

Name: HA Proxy
Description: HAProxy is free, open source software that provides a high availability load balancer and proxy server for TCP and HTTP-based applications that spreads requests across multiple servers
